short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speeds up loading of comments on Astral Codex Ten (https://www.astralcodexten.com/).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Astral Codex Eleven is a browser extension for Chrome and Firefox that speeds up Scott Alexander's blog Astral Codex Ten (https://www.astralcodexten.com/) by reimplementing the comment section.

Main features:

  - Pages load much faster.
  - Keyboard navigation:
      - Enter: collapse/expand comment
      - h: move to parent comment
      - j: move to next comment
      - k: move to previous comment
      - shift + h: move to toplevel comment
      - shift + j: move to next sibling comment
      - shift + k: move to previous sibling comment
  - Full precision timestamp shown when hovering over/focusing on date.

Source code: https://github.com/maksverver/astral-codex-eleven
